name: Slapdash Argonaut: Episode 0
description:
Slapdash Argonaut

a random adventure
Episode 0

This is an adventure about growth; your adventure.

You see, Angel has made a bargain with the big guy upstairs. Do enough good deeds, and get your wings.
That's the deal. Go about things your way, and help who you want to help before night falls.
Will you help out the man with the hair loss problem? How about the alien girl?
Maybe you just want to check out that new arcade that's getting ready to open up. Meet interesting people in interesting (and sometimes humorous!) situations in this bizarre town.

We hope you enjoy getting to know the townsfolk, and come back again and again.

Controls

Mouse cursor and click to move and interact, right click to go back.
Keyboard and Controller supported.
F1 for options
Alt+Enter for Fullscreen
